#Problem 1

```{r problem1_import}
nyc_inspections = read_csv("./DOHMH_New_York_City_Restaurant_Inspection_Results.csv.gz", 
                           col_types = cols(building = col_character()),
                           na = c("NA", "N/A"))
nyc_inspections =
  nyc_inspections %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"), boro != "Missing") %>% 
  mutate(boro = str_to_title(boro)) %>% 
  select(-action, -phone)

```
